comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Phew nice tagging Beachcomber! How did you know about the Chinese Christian Church? Would not have spotted that one away in the background!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons

comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Re the Chinese Christian Church - the building (not sure of the original denomination) shows up in many early photographs of Lavender Bay / Milsons Point, because it was on the ridge line and the tallest thing around until the Harbour Bridge. It's dwarfed by high-rises now GoogleMapsStreetView . I must find out when it was built ...

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] I just realised I know where that is - have been past it many times, how interesting! How much has their view changed!
comment.authorname: Australian National Maritime Museum on The Commons
